actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to establish the Olson Home, Cushing, Maine, as a national historic site.

summary.text: Establishes the Olson Home, Cushing, Maine, as a national historic site. Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire this site by gift or by purchase, together with such additional lands as he deems necessary for the purpose of establishing the national historic site. Authorizes the appropriation of sums necessary to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Olson Home, Cushing, Maine, as a national historic site.
